ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I would prefer not pausing.  It wouldnt be fair to people DO have a little time on their hands during Christmas.  We should treat Chirstmas as if it were

OOC: I would prefer not pausing.  It wouldnt be fair to people DO 
have a little time on their hands during Christmas.  We should treat 
Chirstmas as if it were just the weekend.  Weekends are always slow 
in this RPG, but the RPG never pauses.  So those who can post should 
go right ahead, and those who cant just act like they were on 
vacation without a computer.



-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Allrighty, recently while talking to people about the pausing of 
the 
> RPG for Christmas idea, I've been met with dissagreement and death 
> threats. So, do you guys wanna pause (It'd be something like 
pausing 
> for the 23rd, 24th, and 25th)?
